scripts.android:mainnetDebug: cd android && ./gradlew assembleGeneralBitcoinMainnetDebug && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/generalBitcoinMainnet/debug/app-general-bitcoinMainnet-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n com.liminal/com.liminal.MainActivity
scripts.android:mainnetRelease: cd android && ./gradlew assembleGeneralBitcoinMainnetRelease && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/generalBitcoinMainnet/release/app-general-bitcoinMainnet-release.apk && adb shell am start -n com.liminal/com.liminal.MainActivity
scripts.android:testnetDebug: cd android && ./gradlew assembleGeneralBitcoinTestnetDebug && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/generalBitcoinTestnet/debug/app-general-bitcoinTestnet-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n com.liminal.testnet/com.liminal.MainActivity
scripts.android:testnetRelease: cd android && ./gradlew assembleGeneralBitcoinTestnetRelease && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/generalBitcoinTestnet/release/app-general-bitcoinTestnet-release.apk && adb shell am start -n com.liminal.testnet/com.liminal.MainActivity
